```{#exercise1.1}
a=1:20
print(a)

b=20:1
print(b)

c0=1:20
c1=19:1
c=c(c0,c1)
print(c)

tmp=c(4,6,3)
print(tmp)

a=rep(c(4,6,3),times=10)
print(a)

a=rep(c(4,6,3),times=10)
b=c(a,4)
print(b)

a=rep(4,times=10)
b=rep(6,times=20)
c=rep(3,times=30)
d=c(a,b,c)
print(d)
```
